children.subject: Correct, as long as it's by Friday.
If we drop a course, it wont appear on our transcript right ?
Not sure if you're referring to the EECS deadline or the L&S one, so I would trust the links at the bottom of the post. If you're referring to CoE, I think the bullets make it clear (esp last one).
HSS classes are an exception. I think their grading options can be changed afterwards but no later than a specific date, which I don't remember.

Tomorrow is the last day for EECS students to change a technical class grading option. Note that EECS students can only take a technical class P/NP if it is not required for their major. H/SS grading option can be changed through the 10th week of the semester for EECS students.
is the deadline to change grading option for all classes, or just EECS classes?

history.content:
This is a friendly reminder that this Friday (2/17) is the deadline to add or drop courses. For EECS students, it is also the deadline to change your grading option via Cal Central.

Students often ask the time of the deadline. Although it is 11:59pm, we encourage all students to make necessary changes during the business day. As you know, Cal Central has been unpredictable at times. Your college will likely not approve late drops due to technical issues. 

<<Note: Any action you take that puts you on a waitlist requires department staff to manually process you into a class.  You must make any such changes by absolutely no later than 3pm on Friday for department staff to be able to make that happen before we too are locked out of campus systems.>>

If you need help with Cal Central you have a few options:

SIS users can contact SIS Production Support in three ways:

  1. E-mail:  sishelp@berkeley.edu
  2. Call: 510-664-9000 (then select 6 from the menu)
  3. Submit a ticket: https://berkeley.service-now.com/ess/create_incident
    - In the “Affected Service” section, please choose “SIS - Student Information Systems”

(Note: CalNet ID required to submit a ticket)   

 

For reference: CoE Deadlines & L&S Deadlines
